message:
SYSTEM: Hiroaki_Yamada_talk_Jan19.pdf: Página 23
Wrap-up
• The CRF is still the best among all models.
• Fine-tuning could improve the performance.
• Weights that are trained with unlabeled judgment 
documents help models.
• The model that consider inter-sentence context 
improve the result.
• Next, I will conduct the full experiment with
additional (31 documents) and hyperparameter 
tuning.
24
speaker: SYSTEM
